title: Summoner 13
description: Gryff has finally captured Miralea and Utuni, the two goddesses who wreaked havoc upon the Southern Continent. Now, it’s time to go home.  Or … at least that was the plan.  But after a surprise rift and a hurricane, Gryff finds himself stranded on an unknown island with his friends nowhere in sight.  But he does encounter a shapeshifting warrior princess and gain an awesome new power, so things are definitely looking up.
author: Eric Vall
